get.description: Returns the list of all branches.
Returns the details of a specific branch.

post.description: Creates a new company for the authenticated organisation.

get.description: Returns a single contact by ID if it belongs to your organisation.

put.description: Updates a contact's details and status.
Updates invoice details and may transition invoice status.

get.summary: List tracked line items for an invoice
get.description: Returns related tracked line items grouped by type.

post.description: Creates a payment or payout against the specified invoice.

parameters.name: paymentAccountId
parameters.description: Payment account ID (required for non-external invoices)

post.description: Creates a new job in your organisation.

get.description: Returns a job by ID.

put.description: Updates details for an existing job.

get.description: Lists active activity entries for a job. Optionally filter by type using the activity_entry_type_id query parameter.

post.description: Creates a comment activity entry for a job.

put.description: Updates the status of a job. May trigger validation for active/archived limits.

post.description: Duplicates a job with various configurable options.

get.description: Lists phases for a job in order.

post.description: Creates a new phase for a job.

get.description: Lists active job items for a job.

post.description: Creates a new job item for a job.

get.description: Lists dependencies between job items.
Lists job milestones for a job.

post.description: Creates a new milestone for a job.

get.summary: Get job item role by ID
Get job item sub item by ID
Get job item user by ID

put.summary: Update a job milestone by ID

delete.summary: Delete a job milestone by ID

put.summary: Update a job phase by ID

get.description: Lists master labels for a label type or labels for a specific entity when entity_id is provided.

parameters.name: entity_id
parameters.description: When provided, returns labels for this entity instead of master labels for the type

post.description: Creates a new label for an entity. Optionally creates a master label.

parameters.name: create_master_label
parameters.description: If true, also creates a master label

post.summary: Bulk fetch labels for multiple entities
post.description: Given a mapping of entity class names to arrays of IDs, returns labels for all specified entities.
Creates a new logged expense against a job.

put.description: Updates a logged expense, including status and purchase order details when applicable.

get.summary: Get purchase order for a logged expense
get.description: Returns the purchase order details if the logged expense is a purchase order; otherwise returns null.

get.summary: List purchase order line items for a logged expense
get.description: Returns purchase order line items if the logged expense is a purchase order; otherwise returns an empty list.

post.description: Creates a new logged time entry.
Creates multiple logged time entries in a single request.

get.summary: Get logged time entry by ID

get.description: Returns the organisation associated with the authenticated request.

get.summary: List tracked line items for a quote. Use this to determine the source of a quote line item, as well as where it was eventually invoiced to.
get.description: Returns related tracked line items grouped by type.

get.summary: List quote line items for a quote

get.description: Returns all rate cards associated with your organisation.
Returns a single rate card by ID.
Returns all roles associated with your organisation.
Returns a single role by ID if they belong to your organisation.

post.summary: Runs a report within Streamtime to return grouped results
post.description: Returns a grouped report of records that match the given search criteria. The search criteria are defined by the given search view.

post.summary: Runs a report within Streamtime to return grouped results
post.description: Returns a grouped report of records that match the given search criteria. The search criteria are defined by the given search view.

get.description: Returns all users associated with your organisation.
Returns a single user by ID if they belong to your organisation.

get.summary: List saved segments for a user
get.description: Returns saved segments visible to the specified user.

parameters.name: saved_segment_type_ids
parameters.description: Filter by saved segment type IDs. Provide as a JSON array in the query string.

get.summary: Get the applicable Filter Group Types
get.description: When using the Search routes, you will be providing filters represented by FilterGroupTypes. This route returns the available FilterGroupTypes and their settings for a given list of Search Views (eg Jobs, Expenses, Quotes, etc).

parameters.name: search_views
parameters.description: Which search views you want the filter group types for. Use a comma-separated list of integers representing SearchView enums.

post.description: Returns a paginated array of records that match the given search criteria, as well as statistics about the search. The search criteria are defined by the given search view.

parameters.name: search_view
parameters.description: Which search context is being referred to, eg Jobs, Invoices, Quotes, etc. See SearchView for a list of possible values.

parameters.name: include_statistics
parameters.description: Whether to generate the statistics object in the response. Set to true to include statistics, false to exclude them. These can be slow to generate, so it's recommended to only include them when necessary.

ActivityEntry.title: Activity Entry
ActivityEntry.description: Represents an activity entry on a parent entity (e.g. a job or a thread).

lastModifiedByUserId.description: User ID of the last modifier

parentEntityId.description: ID of the parent entity this activity entry belongs to

threadActivityEntryCount.description: Number of entries in the thread

Branch.title: Branch

companyLeadUserId.description: Lead user ID for this company

TimeAllocationMethod.title: Time Allocation Method
TimeAllocationMethod.description: How the time of an item is allocated, whether as a bucket that is shared amongst all users or individually assigned to each user.

discountPercentage.description: Discount percentage applied to this cycle

billingCycleUnit.description: Unit of time for the billing cycle

billingCycleFrequency.description: Number of units per billing cycle

BillingCycleUnit.title: Billing Cycle Unit
BillingCycleUnit.description: Enumeration representing the unit for a billing cycle (e.g., day, month, year).

FilterGroupTypeOption.title: Filter Group Type Option
FilterGroupTypeOption.description: A list of options that can be used for a given filter group type. Eg, the enumerated Status options the JobStatus filter group type.

FilterGroupTypeSettings.title: Filter Group Settings
FilterGroupTypeSettings.description: The definition of how to use a given FilterGroupType, as well as information describing what is to be returned.

ConditionMatchType.title: ConditionMatchType
ConditionMatchType.description: Whether to apply AND/OR between filters.

OR.title: OR
OR.description: At least one condition must match.

CurrencyContext.title: CurrencyContext
CurrencyContext.description: Which currency context is being referred to. Eg, 'Job' (1) means the value is in the currency of the job.

HOME.title: Home Currency
HOME.description: Values are in your home currency.

JOB.title: Job Currency
JOB.description: Values are in the Job's currency.

EXPENSES.title: Expense Currency
EXPENSES.description: Values are in the Expense's currency.

QUOTES.title: Quote Currency
QUOTES.description: Values are in the Quote's currency.

INVOICES.title: Invoice Currency
INVOICES.description: Values are in the Invoice's currency.

FilterGroupType.title: FilterGroupType
FilterGroupType.description: A specific field that you wish to filter on. Use the /filter_group_types endpoint to get the available filter group types and their settings.

FilterType.title: FilterType
FilterType.description: The basic definition of what type of filter this is.

DATETIME.title: DateTime
DATETIME.description: An ISO 8601 formatted date and time filter.

SearchColumn.title: SearchColumn
SearchColumn.description: A list of columns that can be used in search queries.

SearchView.title: SearchView
SearchView.description: Which search context is being referred to.

QUOTE_LINE_ITEM_INVOICE_LINE_ITEMS.title: Quote Line Item Invoice Line Items
QUOTE_LINE_ITEM_INVOICE_LINE_ITEMS.description: The quote line items that were used in creation of invoice line items.

JOB_ITEM_QUOTE_LINE_ITEMS.title: Job Item Quote Line Items
JOB_ITEM_QUOTE_LINE_ITEMS.description: The job items that were used in creation of quote line items.

LOGGED_EXPENSE_QUOTE_LINE_ITEMS.title: Logged Expense Quote Line Items
LOGGED_EXPENSE_QUOTE_LINE_ITEMS.description: The expenses that were used in creation of quote line items.

JOB_ITEM_INVOICE_LINE_ITEMS.title: Job Item Invoice Line Items
JOB_ITEM_INVOICE_LINE_ITEMS.description: The job items that were used in creation of invoice line items.

LOGGED_EXPENSE_INVOICE_LINE_ITEMS.title: Logged Expense Invoice Line Items
LOGGED_EXPENSE_INVOICE_LINE_ITEMS.description: The expenses that were used in creation of invoice line items.

ValueMatchType.title: ValueMatchType
ValueMatchType.description: How you want the search value compared against the record's value.

GREATER_THAN.title: Greater Than
GREATER_THAN.description: Value must be greater than the record's value.

LESS_THAN.title: Less Than
LESS_THAN.description: Value must be less than the record's value.

BETWEEN.title: Between
BETWEEN.description: Value must be between two values.

GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUALS.title: Greater Than or Equals
GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUALS.description: Value must be greater than or equal to the record's value.

LESS_THAN_OR_EQUALS.title: Less Than or Equals
LESS_THAN_OR_EQUALS.description: Value must be less than or equal to the record's value.

Filter.title: Filter
Filter.description: A specific value you wish to use within the search. This can be a string, integer, or float value. The valueMatchType determines how the value is matched against the data.

FilterGroup.title: Filter Group
FilterGroup.description: A collection of filters to be used for searching.

FilterGroupCollection.title: Filter Group Collection
FilterGroupCollection.description: A collection of filters to be used for searching. Can either contain an array of FilterGroupCollections, OR an array of FilterGroups

FilterGroupSearch.title: Filter Group Search
FilterGroupSearch.description: Data structure to be used when performing searches within Streamtime.

bearerAuth.description:
The Streamtime API uses Bearer Authentication to grant users access to information. It uses security tokens called 'bearer tokens' in the request header to identify who the user is and what information they are able to access.

The bearer token can be generated one of two ways.

### Via APP
This method is best used for customers of Streamtime who want to get access to their data. Tokens are obtained by the subscriber navigating to their Comapny Settings within the App and following the process to request a bearer token.
### Via OAuth
This method is used for third parties who want to offer an integration between their product and any user of streamtime. If you want to connect via OAuth, get in touch with us and we will set you up as a Streamtime Partner.

### Usage
Once you have a bearer token, it needs to be sent in the Authorization header as follows:

`Authorization: Bearer {token}`
